prompts: Create a jellyfish-like Pokemon that thrives in the ocean with vibrant colors.
I want a water-type Pokemon with long tentacles and a sleek, flowing body.
Generate a creature resembling a deep-sea organism, with glowing features and a mystical aura.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a jellyfish, featuring unique patterns and a captivating color palette.
Imagine a dangerous aquatic Pokemon that can shock opponents with its electric tentacles.
Design a Pokemon that has a bioluminescent quality and can camouflage in underwater settings.
Give me an inspiration for a Pokemon that embodies the mysterious depths of the ocean.
